page.title: 05Fairlands Valley
page.content: Fairlands valley starts on some grass land and runs up to a farm house. Fairlands valley is in two parts one part grass land and one part is lakes with boats on. The grass land has a fair on it every so often and lots of people go to it. But on Fairlands Valley lakes there are three parts of lakes, one for boats, one for canoes and paddling boats,ducks and geese and also in the middle of the second one there is an island. On the third one it is shut down. Over Fairlands lakes there is also things to do for chiidren like going in the park bit or going in the paddling pool. The other side of the boating lake has a sort of club house and beside that there are the boats which are put there.In the big lake are fish.
